name: Leonie's 15th Potato Day
description:
Leonie's 15th potato day

 is a simple point and click game in which you try to find as many potatoes as possible!

What makes this game special:

Although the gameplay is super simple, all assets are hand drawn and all music and sound effects were made by a team of four family members and carefully put together!

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with the theme "You're not alone".

Additionaly we made it themed around the birth day potato day of a family potato, as a family project and present!

Controls:

  • Move: A,D or Left,Right Arrow
  • Jump: W, Up Arrow or Space
  • Find potatoes: Left mouse button
  • ESC to go back to Main Menu or Skip the Intro
